website_summaries.verdict: Chances are you'll like this wok's size and power if you need a large model to cook for a group or family, but keep in mind the few noted longevity concerns.
pros: Food isn't likely to stick even without using a lot of oil thanks to this model's outstanding interior coating
1,500 watts of power and 7.4-quart capacity make it family-friendly
cons: A few owners report that their woks quit working unexpectedly within a fairly short time after purchase

customer_reviews.title: A wok is supposed to be have a round inside surface
customer_reviews.text: NOT A WOK! This is nothing more than a electric pan...the pans surface inside is not round I has about a 6 inch flat area at the bottom...not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stir Fry
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike. I primarily use the wok for stir fry of vegetables, chicken, beef, and pork. It heats up quicky and works quite well. I can "hold" the contents by adjusting the heat level. Clean up is remarkably easy as requires little more than using soap and water, rinsing, and the drying by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Caird

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY VALUED ELECTRIC WOK
customer_reviews.text: I've had woks in the past, and wasn't sure if I wanted to try a new one. I'm glad I ordered this appliance because it is easy to operate, easy to clean, and the heat distribution is beyond compare. Add that fact that it has variable heat, I'm one happy consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Melton

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: This wok doesn't control heat distribution at all. It has one temperature, high. It's really disappointing as initially I didn't realize the heat wasn't working properly. I would not recommend this product. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: John Harris

customer_reviews.title: Versatile appliance for a variety of cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great shape with the flat bottom and high sides. Prevents oil splatters when stir frying, which is what I bought it for plus perfect for making soups, pho, squash...as it is deep. Can use for scrambled eggs, like an electric frying pan. Wish the temperature was on the dial versus low medium high. Not super large for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for a ‘hot pot’. It heated the broth quickly and kept up with use. We have used it since for stir fry and it works like a charm. The material and feel of the base is exremely sturdy. We are very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Good, nice and deep. But diameter is not 14".
customer_reviews.text: Even though this looks like its good quality and will server my purpose the reason i gave it 4 stars is because the description is inaccurate. The diameter of this wok is actually 12", not 14" as shown in one of the pictures. That is misleading information.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Option
customer_reviews.text: We love our VonShef Wok! It adds so much variety to our meals and it cooks evenly and quickly. So easy to make super healthy dinners. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DK Wornick

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: I like the depth, controls splatter very well, heats up quickly, have used with PF Chang frozen meals, works well for quick meal, so far love this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great While it Lasted
customer_reviews.text: We lightly used it, we kept it clean, we loved it, and then it went completely dead on month 12. I’ve reached out to the sellers, but I’m guessing they won’t stand behind this product. We will upgrade the rating if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wok to try to replace a wok that I had loved and used for 20 years. Many of the ones I looked at were not large enough or were cheaply made. This is solid, well made and cooks like my old wok with good temperature control ..Love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: We just received the wok and used it this last weekend to make pineapple fried rice and sesame chicken. It worked very well. The wok got hot enough to 'fry' the chicken, and when mixing the rice, it was large enough to handle all of the ingredients. Excited to use it to try more 'wok cooking.' Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I like this product pretty much. Yes it’s so easy to clean. It’s sturdy and warmth. It’s one of my best cooking gadgets that I use. I love it cause I could use it in frying pork chops and yet the oil won’t splash all over the place. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Zenya

customer_reviews.title: The wok broke two days after I bought it. It's still so expensive
customer_reviews.text: The wok broke two days after I bought it. It's still so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok! I have used it almost everyday that I’ve had it! Easy to clean, no sticking! Stir fries large amounts at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our old Electric wok stop working. This was a great replacement. I like that the food does not stick and cleans up nice
customer_reviews.author: Money

customer_reviews.title: Good at the beginning, then dead after 1 month of usage.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the wok works perfectly at the beginning. Then after a month of using it, it just stopped working yesterday. I noticed some reviews about very short usage before I purchased the wok. I thought I might be a lucky one. I guess it is not about luck, it is the product issue. DO NOT BUY THIS WOK. YOU WILL REGRET!
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Xiangtian

customer_reviews.title: Wok cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Wok! It i so awesome it heats great and has a warm setting! The glass lid seals great and is good to see if you have to steam. Clean up is great and easy! Been cooking some healthy chinese and it frys too! Came packed great and quick! Ordering one for my daughters! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn5311

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love it works wonderful so far we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like.
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding once you understand how the temp is. You can cook practically anything in it. And so easy to clean...nothing sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Applestein

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present. My mom loves it and uses it constantly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall it performs very well
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bottom would be a little more spherical but that is just a personal preference. I'm sure I will adapt to the Wok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wok I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wok I have ever owned! I made stir fry beef and broccoli and it was perfect. The seller was right on time, no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Outtatown53

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. So easy to clean and deep enough to fry fish.
customer_reviews.author: KJL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not a traditional wok but perfect for us and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jen L.

customer_reviews.title: A good wok at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: The depth of this wok sets it apart! My wife loves it, so I'm happy with it also!
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great wok!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it heats up very fast. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We cooked for about 10 people and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: A nice wok, but the shape might present some challenges.
customer_reviews.text: This product was used during the 2018 Holiday Season to make pheasant fried rice, for a family meal that included 7 adults. Although the material quality and durability seems to be fine, it was rather awkward to prepare fried rice and all ingredients in this work for a family meal of seven adults. The shape of the wok did not allow ingredients to be moved around very easily, especially if some were to simply be set aside for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: This Wok heats up quickly and keeps hot. It is great for stir fry vegetables. I have also used it to cook chicken breasts, make eggs, rices, and many other things. The non-stick coating is really non-stick. You can easily clean it with a moist paper towel. Nothing sticks to it. I have seen some reviews that said it is not a genuine Wok since it has a flat bottom. Well, it also doesn't have ridges on the side to push food up onto to get out of the heat either. But for many of us that just want a quick and easy way to make stir fry, this pan works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!!!Stopped working after less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wok to make stir fry and ham fried rice. It seemed to work good and we only used it once or twice a month. After the 6th month it just quit working. Always kept stored away nicely in original box and just one day it worked we were half way done cooking and it stopped and would not turn on again! Would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After less then 2 years it died.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this wok very often. It’s a little over 1.5 years old—and it just died. The prongs are clean. It’s never been submerged. But it died. Hugely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy Doody

customer_reviews.title: All I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great large size, like the lid shape and that it sits high on top of the wok so inside volume can be maximized. Very pleased with it, it replaces an old iron wok that is a number of decades old and used to rust. Quite happy with purchase, product, packaging was great, and delivery time great too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Heats up well ...a little deep
customer_reviews.text: this unit is great...heats up well and the non stick material is easy to clean up...it is a bit deep for a "wok" but I love this unit and would buy again. I especially like the fact that the power cord seperates from the unit for clean up and washing.
customer_reviews.author: johnnymmmm

customer_reviews.title: Using it more and more.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a flat electric stove top so it was just a matter of time until I got an electric wok. I admit - I now use this more than the insta-pot. It cleans with just a wipe out with a little water. It cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelRV

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it’s easy to clean and fits in perfectly with my other favorite appliances on my shelf in kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Erykah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wok and I use it everyday for cooking so I hope it holds up! Seems much more solid than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wok!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Made some stir fry it turned out excellent! Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Conner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good high heat.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Pretty good high heat for stir fry. Good for deep fry too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time for purchasing this item. It's a really good product and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Seng La

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny G.

product_meta.title: VonShef 7.4Qt Electric Wok with Lid – Adjustable Temperature Control – Cool Touch Handles – Non-Stick, Easy Clean Frying Pan - 14 Inch
feature_bullets: 7.4QT CAPACITY ELECTRIC WOK – this large electric aluminium wok offers plenty of space to cook up large portions of delicious Asian-style dishes
14 INCH WOK NON-STICK – interior features an advanced coating to prevent food sticking and enables healthy little-to-no-oil cooking
ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL – use the rotary dial to select one of 4 heat settings: Warm (176°F), Low (302°F), Medium (374°F) & High (446°F)
COOL TOUCH HANDLES – both the tempered glass lid and the aluminium pan feature heat-resistant silicone handles for added ease of use
DIMENSIONS – L14.8” x D14” x 8.7”. Weight: 5.5lb

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars153 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
